name: Amexio panel
description: Panel provides an easy way to organize big forms by grouping the fields in panel

properties.name: expanded
properties.description: Pane will expand or collapse based on the boolean.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Height of panel must be in px ex.100, 250..

properties.name: context-menu
properties.description: Context Menu provides the panel on right click(for Array structure: refer typescript code in source tab)

properties.name: amexio-panel-header
properties.description: Panel Header renders any component within it by using toolbar as its outer shell

events.name: onClick
events.description: Fires the on accordion pane click event.

events.name: rightClick
events.description: It is fired when clicked on context menu providing Panel node data and selected context menu data.
